Title: Scooby-Doo and the Alien Invaders
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Family, Mystery, Sci-Fi
Writer: William Hanna (characters), Joseph Barbera (characters), Davis Doi (story), Glenn Leopold (story), Davis Doi (screenplay), Lance Falk (screenplay)
Actors: Scott Innes, Mary Kay Bergman, Frank Welker, B.J. Ward
Plot: A cosmic case of flying saucers, intergalactic intrigue and out-of-this-world romance launches Scooby-Doo and the Mystery Gang into their most unearthly adventure ever.
